Quickstrike:





Quickstrike sat himself firmly on the chair in front of the computer. "Dang 
it!" He felt no one was listening to him. He didn't look at the monitors. He 
didn't even want to try to figure out how it worked. He may just mess it up. 
Dark Mouse was the one who put it together. Hell Beast's computer he could 
hack into and nose around in the files and find out how to work it, but this 
one was different.

He leaned on the console with his elbow. He stared out into the outside, 
groaning to himself.
